title: NHS boss issues warning over 'danger' of using AI chatbots for mental health support this Christmas
description: An NHS boss has warned people with mental health problems to avoid using artificial intelligence (AI) for support over Christmas.
content:
Dr Adrian James, national medical director for mental health at NHS England, said the technology is a “fantastic resource when used appropriately” but it cannot be “relied upon for everything and in some cases can be dangerous”.
He said it is “vital”... [3141 chars]

description: NHS director warns of ‘danger’ of turning to artificial intelligence (AI) for mental health advice this Christmas saying it has an ‘in-built preference to agree’

title: AI ‘Bill of Rights’ emerges in State Senate
description: News Service of Florida — In a priority of Gov. Ron DeSantis, a Senate Republican on Monday filed a proposal dubbed the “Artificial Intelligence Bill of Rights.”
content:
News Service of Florida — In a priority of Gov. Ron DeSantis, a Senate Republican on Monday filed a proposal dubbed the “Artificial Intelligence Bill of Rights.”

title: VP Radhakrishnan welcomes AI in school curricula, says India should take lead
description: VP C.P. Radhakrishnan advocates for AI in school curricula, urging India to lead in artificial intelligence development.

title: From Discoverative AI to the Entropy of Tolerance: Tianqiao Chen's Vision of Human-AI Co-Evolution
description: SAN MATEO, Calif., Dec. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Shanda Group has entered a period of renewed visibility, with a series of incubated ventures coming to light over the past several months. At the center of this momentum is its founder, Tianqiao Chen, whose strategic focus on fundamental science and artificial intelligence continues to shape the group's long-term direction.

title: Don't be pessimist about new age tech: Vice President Radhakrishnan
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 23: Vice President C P Radhakrishnan on Tuesday said artificial intelligence is no longer a concept of the future but a reality of the present and asserted that there was no need to be pessimist about new age technology. Addressing a conclave organised by Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU), in collaboration with the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), on AI evolution here, he said computers faced resistance  when it was introduced but went on […]
